ServiceWorkerRegistrationScope.summary: The scope read-only property of the interface returns a string representing a URL that defines a service worker's registration scope; that is, the range of URLs a service worker can control. This is set using the scope parameter specified in the call to which registered the service worker.

remarks.para:
-Using Service Workers
-Service workers basic code example
-Using web workers

ServiceWorkerRegistrationScope.value: Returns a string representing a URL that defines a service worker's registration scope.
